reviewText: My three year old is obsessed with volcanoes, eruptions, and especially lava.  We have watched Natural Geographic videos and even ordered "Lava and Lava Tubes" from Amazon.  Nothing comes close to the nearly constant viewing of lava, and lava eruptions on the Kilauea update DVD.  If you are looking for THE lava video for your budding volcanologist, this really is the DVD for you.  Look no further.
